name: Jean Claude Robuste
bio: Jean Claude Robuste was born in Port-au-Prince on October 24, 1946. His father was in the military and his mother was a dress designer. He attended Ecole Nationale des Casernes Dessalines and Lycee Francois Duvalier. In 1969 he began drawing and painting with David Rouzier and Frank Robuste, his older brother.

publications.author: Franciscus, John Allen
publications.title: Haiti: Voodoo Kingdom to Modern Riviera
